module.name: schematic_element_library
module.keywords: module, class, library, set theory, schematic element, symbol library

purpose.p: This part of ISO 10303 specifies an application module to record:

ul.li: a library of schematic elements, with their internal whole-part and connection relationships;
the relationships between the schematic elements in the library and the things that they symbolize.

li.p: the definition of a schematic element;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Schematic_element application module.

li.p: set theory relationships between schematic element definitions;
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Set_theory application module.

li.p: a symbolization relationship between a schematic element in a library and the thing that it symbolizes.
li.note: This capability is provided by the referenced Symbolization_by_schematic_element application module.

li.p: the occurrence of a schematic element on a drawing.
li.note: The occurrence of a schematic element on a drawing is within the scope of the Schematic_drawing application module.
